long_description: Pack the medium REI Campware Backpacker cookset to make quick trail meals without weighing down your pack. Cookset includes a 1.8 liter pot, a 1.1 liter pot, a single lid, 2 small camp towels and a mesh storage sack; lid fits both pots securely. Teflon(R) Classic coating provides excellent nonstick performance, making the post-meal cleanup a breeze. Pots are made of lightweight aluminum that distributes heat evenly for efficient cooking. Fold-out handles on the pots provide good control while pouring. Nesting design allows the 1.1 liter pot to fit in the 1.8 liter pot; ultralight stove and isobutane fuel canister (both sold separately) fit inside the 1.1 liter pot. Use the included camp towels to protect the nonstick surfaces when packing up the cookset.
short_description: Pack the medium REI Campware Backpacker cookset to make quick trail meals without weighing down your pack.
